numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows the probability of getting in.
2. A higher income percentile increases the probability of getting in.
3. Being a legacy applicant increases the probability of getting in.
4. If a person is in the 99th income percentile then the person is almost guaranteed to get in.
5. I wonder why the graph is heavily skewed toward rich people.
6. I wonder if some systems can be put in place to remedy this imbalance.
7. This graph has a great impact on me.
8. This graph has a great impact on my community.
9. Many people in my community are currently applying to college.
10. The graph shows an unfair advantage for rich people in accessing education.
11. The headline is: The rich get richer: how the wealthy monopolize elite education.
